name: paymentAuthorizationController(_:didAuthorizePayment:completion:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the user authorized the payment request, and asks for a result. DeprecatedUse paymentAuthorizationController(_:didAuthorizePayment:handler:) instead.
declaration:
optional func paymentAuthorizationController(_ controller: PKPaymentAuthorizationController, 
                         didAuthorizePayment payment: PKPayment, 
                                  completion: @escaping (PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus) -> Void)
